text: Consider jeden ist okolo ghost town zazrak Ako mozem GOD revive this it umrel? GOD potom put him smrt 100 rocnik potom resurrected him! He said "Ako long have ona zostat tu? He said ja je tu dni part dni. He nie said Ona bol tu sto rocnik. look do tvoj food pne; they nie spoil Look tvoj donkey -My thus render ona lekcia ludia. ihned note ako my zostrojit bones potom pokryvka them ani. ryba. ani. rak. When he realized co happened he said Teraz ja zauzlit lenze GOD bol Omnipotent
